ratings.comment: Very good professor for being so young, very organized, helpful.Class material is thought-provoking and he shows many ways to think about each subject. We analyze conservative, liberal, moderate approaches and everyone can feel safe to discuss their opinion. He is never too political himself yet stimulates engaging conversation.

Suprisingly great prof for such a young age. Very intersting class material, well facilitated discussions, easy papers with interesting open-ended prompts. interesting and fun class, important material, easy to breeze by but also can learn alot if you make the most of it.

Chris is a TA for freshman english. I would recommend him but be ready for a teacher that loves politics and is sometimes unclear. The class is EXTREMELY repetitive and the work you have to do is a little ridiculous at times but overall it's an easy class and I will give it to him -- he's a nice guy
